features: Our Suave Professionals Keratin Infusion Shampoo and Conditioner is a salon proven smoothing system, infused with Keratin, that helps seal the cuticle and provides lasting smoothness
Leaving hair smooth and manageable, the Suave Professionals Keratin Infusion Conditioner is a smoothing conditioner detangles and controls frizz
This shampoo and conditioner system helps provide frizz control for up to 48 hours
Suave Professionals Keratin Infusion shampoo & conditioner system salon-proven to prevent frizz as well as Kérastase Oléo-Relax (Kérastase is a registered trademark of L’Oréal SA)
Our hair conditioner leaves hair feeling smooth and manageable for easy styling
For best results, use this conditioner for dry hair with the Suave Professionals Keratin Infusion Shampoo
body.description: Product Description Smooth frizz with our Suave Professionals Keratin Infusion system. This salon proven system, infused with Keratin, helps seal the cuticle and provide lasting smoothness with up to 48 hour frizz control. Leaving hair smooth and manageable, Suave Professionals Keratin Infusion Conditioner is a frizz control conditioner and smoothing conditioner that detangles and controls frizz. Our hair conditioner leaves hair feeling smooth and manageable for easy styling. This system also contains our unique QuenchLock. Technology that works by delivering lightweight micro-moisturizing particles that lock in hydration to help make hair strong to reduce breakage. The results, a system that leaves hair smooth and healthy-looking. Suave Professionals Keratin Infusion Shampoo and Conditioner for hair are salon proven to prevent frizz as well as Kérastase Oléo-Relax. (Kérastase is a registered trademark of L'Oréal SA). For best results, use this conditioner for dry hair with our Suave Professionals Keratin Infusion Shampoo. And for enhanced smoothness, follow this anti-frizz conditioner and shampoo system with Keratin Infusion Leave-In Conditioner for enhanced smoothness. Also use Suave Professionals styling products, which include hair sprays, serums, gels, and leave-in conditioners to help you achieve your desired look. Achieve Salon-Quality Results. Suave Professionals is salon-proven to work as well as salon brands, helping you achieve a variety of beautiful hairstyles all while caring for your hair. This line is developed to help you achieve naturally gorgeous, healthy-looking locks. About Suave. For over 75 years Suave has offered professional quality haircare and skincare products for the entire family, The Suave mission is to make gold standard quality attainable to all, so everyone can look good, smell good, and feel good every day. From the Manufacturer Suave Professionals Keratin Infusion Smoothing Conditioner

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: This salon-proven, pH-balanced conditioner gently conditions hair while restoring lost keratin from within the hair cuticle for lasting smoothness. For sleek and easy-to-style tresses, try this smoothing conditioner that detangles and controls frizz for up to 48 hours.

Detangle & Condition This smoothing conditioner controls frizz leaving hair smooth and manageable. Unique QuenchLock Technology Works by delivering lightweight micro-moisturizing particles that lock in hydration to help make hair strong and reduce breakage. System leaves hair smooth and healthy-looking. OUR PROMISE Suave is dedicated to making gold standard quality attainable to all, so everyone can look, smell and feel good daily. BEST RESULTS When paired with Suave Professionals Smoothing Shampoo, this smoothing conditioner delivers up to 48 hours of frizz control and stunningly-sleek hair.

Suave Keratin Infusion Smoothing Shampoo This salon-proven smoothing system, infused with Keratin, helps seal the cuticle and provides lasting smoothness. Leaving hair smooth and manageable, this smoothing shampoo detangles and controls frizz. SUAVE KERATIN INFUSION COLOR CARE SHAMPOO This salon-proven color-protecting system, infused with Keratin and UV Complex, helps seal the cuticle and keeps color vibrant. This low-sulfate, pH-balanced smoothing shampoo gently cleanses, leaving hair vibrant. SUAVE KERATIN INFUSION COLOR CARE CONDITIONER This salon-proven color-protecting system, infused with Keratin and UV Complex, helps seal the cuticle and keeps color vibrant. Leaving hair smooth and manageable, this smoothing conditioner detangles and controls frizz for up to 48 hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Transform Your Hair with Suave Professionals Smoothing Conditioner
reviews.reviewText: I recently tried Suave Professionals Smoothing Conditioner For Dry Hair Keratin Infusion Hair Conditioner and I am thrilled with the results! This conditioner left my hair feeling incredibly soft, silky, and smooth. I noticed a significant reduction in frizz and flyaways, and my hair was much easier to style and manage. The keratin-infused formula seems to have repaired my damaged hair, leaving it looking healthy and shiny. Additionally, the conditioner has a lovely fragrance that lingers in my hair all day. Overall, I highly recommend this product to anyone looking for a high-quality conditioner that delivers on its promises.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I started buying this as a budget alternative to my pantine conditioner. I wouldn't say it performs to the same caliber, but For the lower price it is excellent.I ran out of detangler from my child, And I won't go back to buying it because this conditioner works far better than any detangler ever did!! And it leaves their hair feeling very soft and smooth.Also I got another use out of it, which is a little funny to review. But this shampoo and conditioner work phenomenally to defrizz and smooth Barbie hair! The dolls' hair all feel light and smooth and they smell great! I've gotten a few compliments on the way the dolls' hair smell haha.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Working for me
reviews.reviewText: This conditioner has made my hair so soft & tangle free. Very satisfied.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great results for a lot less
reviews.reviewText: I’ve tried many types of non-salon products and this one is definitely the best for my thick, dry(er) hair. And can’t beat the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars This conditioner is great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This conditioner works great. I leave it on longer, about 30 mins under a cap then I rinse it out. Great for the damaging effects of the Florida Sun.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this conditioner!
reviews.reviewText: This hair conditioner leaves my hair silky smooth, it smells wonderful, & doesn’t leave a residue on my hair. The price is comparable to store prices & I can purchase a box of them saving me more trips to the store. Will continue to purchase from Amazon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Excelente y el precio único y deja el pelo bello
